summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Curl Defining Cream is an argan-oil-infused styling and conditioning product for all curl types that activates and defines curls while fighting frizz.
details: DetailsBenefitsSeparates and defines curlsConditions and provides soft holdCombats frizzImparts shineLeaves curls silky smoothIncreases bounce and movementKey IngredientsArgan Oil: Restores elasticity, smoothness, and manageability to hairPolyquaternium-11: Forms a lightweight film around hair to hold curlHydrolyzed Vegetable Protein: Coats porous strands and split endsResearch Results48-hour curl definition**Based on an independent lab studyItem 2644247How To UseAfter shampooing and conditioning, apply a generous amount to damp hair. For best results, rake hands through hair to increase separation. Let air dry. For extra bounce, diffuse.Caution: Use product only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse immediately with water. For external use only.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycol Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Parfum/Fragrance, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyquaternium-11, Steareth-2, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein Pg-Propyl Silanetriol, Cellulose, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Pg-Hydroxyethylcellulose Cocodimonium Chloride, Glucose, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sorbitan Oleate, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Acrylates Copolymer, Polyquaternium-10, Polyquaternium-37, Polyquaternium-55, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Sodium Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool. MOCDC04
how_to_use: After shampooing and conditioning, apply a generous amount to damp hair. For best results, rake hands through hair to increase separation. Let air dry. For extra bounce, diffuse.Caution: Use product only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse immediately with water. For external use only.

reviews.headline: Best Curly Cream for Curly Hair!
reviews.comments: I tried the product as it was gifted to me and my 3B curly hair absolutely LOVED IT! ðŸ’Œ I normally have extremely dry hair and I love the thickness of the curl cream, plus it smells amazing! I tried the product on its own on my bleached damaged curly hair and really noticed a difference in curl moisture and retention. Thank you Moroccan Oil! I would recommend this product to anyone with curly dry hair that's looking for a product to repair and nourish those curls!

reviews.headline: My go to conditioner for defining both my curls and edges
reviews.comments: Using a leave in conditioner for your edges gives it a more natural and sleek finish. The curl defining cream from @Moroccanoil is definitely a favorite of mines. I'm so glad they sent me a fresh bottle to keep my curls hydrated and moisturized. #giftedbymoroccanoil

reviews.headline: Love this!!!
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil | I absolutely love the Moroccanoil Curl Cream! It defines my curls without weighing them down and gives them a soft, touchable hold that lasts all day. I've noticed less frizz and more shine since I started using it, and it keeps my hair feeling hydrated without any sticky residue.

reviews.headline: Just what my curls needed!
reviews.comments: Wow this is just what curls needed to look defined, bouncy, frizz free and absolutely beautiful. I love that this cream is creamy yet lightweight and doesn't weight down my curls. It instantly transforms hair to look smooth, healthy and shiny. I am excited to add this Curl Defining Cream to my routine. Gifted by Moroccan Oil

reviews.headline: This smells amazing!!!
reviews.comments: I recieved this gifted by morrocanoil for my honest review. This product smells amazing. I tried to lather quite a lot and immediately it didn't give me curls, but I slept with the product in and woke up with really nice curls

reviews.headline: Great for frizzy, finer curls
reviews.comments: I received this product gifted by moroccanoil in exchange for my honest opinion. I genuinely do like this product and it seems to work well for my hair type. Because I have fine, thin-ish curly hair, I find that a lot of hair products can look good and hold my curls well at first but then fall after a while more dramatically. It's frustrating trying to find something that doesn't look greasy or ends up heavy on my curls. So this cream is a winner for me! Seems to hold in well after I rewet my curls a day later too.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Moroccanoil, but here is my honest review. This cream has helped me dry curls and brought back moisture to my hair! I am definitely going to add this into my curly hair routine! It also works great for day 2 and 3 curls!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: LOVE this curling cream! As someone with type 4 hair, I value products that smell good, work well and pair nicely with other products- and this cream hits all three! Great consistency and perfect for moisturizing. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: great for defining curls
reviews.comments: This cream made my curls look really defined without any frizz or flyaways. It does put a light film around your strands that you can kind of feel but doesn't make your hair look greasy or dirty. It also lasts through the whole day even on really hot days! *received complimentary from moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Loveeeeee!!!
reviews.comments: This product has a white cream appearance with a super thick consistency. When I applied it to my hair, it did leave a bit of residue on my hands, but adding a little water and scrunching helped distribute it evenly. I feel like it gives my hair extra hydration and tames frizz beautifully. I absolutely love Moroccanoil's entire line, and the scent is just as incredible as always. This product was kindly gifted by Moroccanoil for review purposes.

reviews.headline: Wasn't a good fit
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil. I gave this to my daughter to try out because her hair is very curly and her curl pattern is much tighter than mine. Unfortunately, this product did not work for her. She said it made her hair feel very dry. It surprised me a lot because other products by this brand have been nourishing for her hair. This just didn't work for her.

reviews.headline: Curls are a dream
reviews.comments: Gifted by Moroccanoil. This curl cream makes my curls last all day and really defines them with zero frizz. Doesn't even harden. SO much better than gel.  I would defiantly recommend to any of my friends.

reviews.headline: great curl cream
reviews.comments: Complimentary from moroccanoil i got to try the curl cream and it was really nice. i have somewhat dry loose curls and it held my shape very nice. it didn't leave my crunchy or oily. it left my hair feeling soft yet holding its shape.

reviews.headline: So much volume
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil. I have type 3 curly hair and just love how soft and hydrated my curls feel. I definitely recommend and will get it again because it was so easy to style my hair and it had so much volume.

reviews.headline: Maybe not best for my wavy hair
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Moroccanoil this product in exchange for my review. So I'll be honest I have wavy hair not curly but I thought I'd should try something like this to see how my hair would react. Yes I did get more of a wave out of it when using and air drying. But I may have used too much product and make my hair a bit crunchy.

reviews.headline: Your curls will thank you
reviews.comments: This curl creme is so nice and easy to use. It brings my daughters curls back to life and her hair looks bouncy and healthy. I love that it doesn't weigh down the hair and it leaves your hair looking clean and shiny. Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: great
reviews.comments: I have a hard time finding a good curl cream that actually defines my curls without making it feel weird or sticky but this product really does it for me. I love that it eliminated the frozen in my hair, which is something I struggle with when it comes to maintaining curls. complimentary from Moroccanoil.

reviews.headline: Must have!
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Morrocan oil their curl defining cream & absolutely love it! It leaves my curls soft, bouncy, and defined without making them feel crunchy or heavy. The formula is super hydrating and helps control frizz, even on humid days. A little goes a long way, and it smells amazing too! This has quickly become a staple in my hair routine.

reviews.headline: So good!
reviews.comments: I love the scent of moroccanoil products so much! It's such an iconic tropical beach scent! I have semi curly hair and I love this defining cream! It's not sticky, defines my curls especially when I air dry my hair, and it smells great. I highly recommend it! Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: so bomb
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil. absolutely obsessed with this product. I can't get enough of it. It smells so good. This whole line smells so good. It makes my curls feel so soft and I love when my hair feels luxurious smells good and the curls are popping.

media.headline: My go to conditioner for defining both my curls and edges
media.caption: Curl defining cream

faceoff_positive.comments:
I just tried the defining Curl Cream, and I really like it. For context, I have very long, thick, coarse, dry wavy/curly hair, and most curl products don't mesh well with my texture â€” they either weigh it down or leave it looking frizzy.

This curl cream really surprised me. It defines my curls beautifully while still keeping them soft and natural. My hair looks so much better than usual, with smoother, more consistent curls, but without that heavy, crunchy feel some creams give.

The hold is very light â€” so if you're looking for something strong, this isn't the one. But for lightweight curl definition that makes hair look healthier, shinier, and more polished, it's perfect. I feel like it enhances my natural texture rather than trying to control it. I do wish it  had a bit of a better hold, but I still really like this.

This product was gifted to me by Moroccanoil, but these are my 100% honest thoughts. If it didn't work for me, I'd say so â€” but I truly love it, and it's going to stay in my curl routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Nice Curl Cream for Dry Coarse Hair

faceoff_negative.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil. I gave this to my daughter to try out because her hair is very curly and her curl pattern is much tighter than mine. Unfortunately, this product did not work for her. She said it made her hair feel very dry. It surprised me a lot because other products by this brand have been nourishing for her hair. This just didn't work for her.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wasn't a good fit
